title: Taxation districts
context: §231-2 Taxation districts. For the purpose of taxation, the State is divided into four districts, viz.: (a) The city and county of Honolulu, to be called the first district; (b) The counties of Maui and Kalawao, to be called the second district; &copy; The county of Hawaii, to be called the third district; (d) The county of Kauai, to be called the fourth district. [L 1932 2d, c 40, §2; RL 1935, §1901; RL 1945, §5102; RL 1955, §115-2; am L 1967, c 37, §1; HRS §231-2] Cross References Districts, generally, see chapter 4. Case Notes Cited: 34 H. 515, 530.
